translations: 准备就绪的（ready 的比较级）

sentences.sentence: He'll be shyer an' readier to take things ill.
sentences.translation: 他会更害羞，更容易把事情往坏处想。

sentences.sentence: This new system gives users readier access to the data.
sentences.translation: 这个新系统可以使用户们更快捷地进入数据库。

sentences.sentence: The financial crisis has made people readier to cut corners.
sentences.translation: 财政危机使得人们更愿意“超近道”。
